course.detail: Bachelor of Computer Applications focuses on computer science and its applications in various fields.
Master of Computer Applications is a postgraduate degree focusing on advanced computer science concepts.
Bachelor of Science covers foundational and advanced topics in physical, chemical, and biological sciences.
An advanced undergraduate degree with a focus on specialization in a particular science subject.
Bachelor of Commerce focuses on commerce, finance, accounting, and economics.
Master of Commerce focuses on advanced studies in commerce, finance, and business management.
Bachelor of Business Administration focuses on management, leadership, and entrepreneurship skills.
Master of Business Administration focuses on advanced business and management strategies.
Bachelor of Arts covers humanities, social sciences, and liberal arts subjects.
An undergraduate degree offering in-depth knowledge in a specific humanities or social science subject.
Bachelor of Arts in Education prepares students for a career in teaching and education.
Bachelor of Hotel Management trains students in hospitality management and hotel operations.
Bachelor of Laws is an undergraduate program in legal education for becoming a lawyer.
Master of Laws is a postgraduate law degree offering advanced legal studies and specialization.
A technical diploma offering practical skills and training in various engineering and technical fields.
Bachelor of Pharmacy focuses on pharmaceutical science and prepares students for a career in pharmacy.
Diploma in Pharmacy is a short-term program for training in basic pharmaceutical science and practice.
Bachelor of Education trains students to become professional educators and teachers.
Master of Education is a postgraduate program focusing on advanced teaching methods and educational research.
Bachelor of Technology offers education in various engineering disciplines, combining theory and practical applications.
Master of Technology is a postgraduate engineering degree focusing on specialized and advanced engineering studies.
Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery prepares students for a career in medicine and surgery.
Bachelor of Dental Surgery trains students to become dental professionals and oral health specialists.
Bachelor of Physiotherapy educates students in physical therapy and rehabilitation practices.
General Nursing and Midwifery prepares students for careers in nursing, focusing on patient care and midwifery.
Auxiliary Nurse Midwifery trains students to assist in basic health care and midwifery services.
